sentence.text: Extensive glycosaminoglycan catabolic process gene deletions were identified in four patients; using DNA microarray analysis two patients showed the loss of the entire regulation of gene expression gene, and epilepsy developed in only one of them.

Wide allelic heterogeneity was noted, with large gene alterations (e.g. glycosaminoglycan catabolic process/IDSP1 gene inversions, partial to extensive IDS deletions, and one chimeric IDS-IDSP1 allele) that occurred at higher frequencies than previously reported (36% vs 18.9-29%).

Our findings suggest a wide allelic heterogeneity in Mexican MPSII patients; DNA microarray analysis contributes to further delineation of the resulting phenocardiac muscle tissue development for glycosaminoglycan catabolic process and neighboring loci deletions
